Summary: B32 and B62 buses may experience delays to and from the Pulaski Bridge and will wait out any temporary lane closures
Description:
B32 and B62 buses may experience delays to and from the Pulaski Bridge and will wait out any temporary lane closures
Please allow additional travel time.

What's happening?
DOT- Pulaski Bridge work

Summary: Northbound B16 stop on Caton Ave at Ocean Pkwy is closed; buses will make a stop on Caton Ave between Ocean Pkwy and E 7th St instead
Description:

Construction

Summary: Eastbound M21 stops on E Houston St at Columbia St and Baruch Dr are being bypassed
Description:
Eastbound M21 stops on E Houston St at Columbia St and Baruch Dr are being bypassed
For service, use the stops on E Houston St at Ridge St or Mangin St instead.

See a map of the detour.

What's happening?
Utility construction

Summary: M3 stops along St Nicholas Ave between W 170th St and W 179th St are closed in both directions
Description:
M3 stops along St Nicholas Ave between W 170th St and W 179th St are closed in both directions
For northbound service, use the stops on St Nicholas Ave at W 167th St or W 179th St.

For southbound service, use the stops on St Nicholas Ave at W 181st St or W 168th St.

Buses also make requested stops at the M5 stops along Broadway between W 170th St and W 179th St in both directions.

See a map of the detour.

What's happening?
Paving

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Southbound M1 and M2 buses bypass the stop on 5th Ave at 109th St
Description:
Southbound M1 and M2 buses bypass the stop on 5th Ave at 109th St
What's Happening?
Central Park Perimeter Construction

Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate or available in the service change area.

Summary: Southbound BxM11 stop on Boston Rd at Pelham Parkway North has been discontinued.
Description:
Southbound BxM11 stop on Boston Rd at Pelham Parkway North has been discontinued.
Customers are advised to use the new stop on White Plains Rd at Waring Ave or Boston Rd at Pelham Parkway south of intersection.
See a map of the stop change.

What's happening?
Safety Concerns

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: 74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
Description:
74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
[accessibility icon] The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside [accessibility icon] [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?
We're replacing the elevators

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
